column5: Has anyone heard of a 42# pike that was caught in North America a few weeks ago. Not that monster from Spain that was on the board ( awesome) Trying to find out more. Dieing to find out where it was supposedly taken.
Nope, haven't heard of it.  Just tried to Google it, but found nothing.  Let us know when you find out.  Joey
I know of a 36.5 lber caught in Manitoba the other day. The pictures were posted on the site I belong to. Its not 42 lbs though. Sorry, must be another fish. Huge regardless.
that 50+ pounder that was caught in Italy, is all ready making the rounds. Received it in my email twice last week. Same fish possibly.
GB.  Any chance you can post that 36 pounder?
